title: Does anyone know which app could be triggering this ?
selftext: I have been getting this popup in icici and hdfc app and have Uninstalled a lot of apps since then to figure out what could be causing this. Has anyone else faced this issue ?
comments: Go to the permissions in the settings and see which apps has screen recording/sharing permissions and then remove it.
None of the apps has this permission, checked a few times already :-o
Uninstall and reinstall the app. If the issue still persists, turn off Developer Mode and check if any application has administrator privileges.
Install m kabach 2 app its a government app to find malicious apps and software.scan it using it
Go to permissions and turn off permission to run apps in the background.
Check all background apps and permissions. If you find nothing be very careful. Download an antivirus and if needed go to a store.
Lauda mai kisi sarkari app pe trust karra
I think it's because some app has the permission to display over other apps.
Hdfc app is a bug itself they are launching a new one ðŸ”œ
This right here.  I think you can find it under accessibility features too

Go in settings and manage app in sub menu select list all apps and look for an app with no name. 
There are some malwares that get installed as an app with blank logo and blank name.
Disable all of your accessibility features... Because some of this services can read your screen all the time...
U should break the screen right now, it's really dangerous
Any desk.
TeamViewer
Try resetting app preferences
I used to get the same alert while sharing my screen on Discord.
Makes sense, lemme check this out, thanks
It's the same with icici as well so not an app specific thing
Thanks, found 1 matching this description. Uninstalled!
Crazy number of apps had this option enabled, disabled for all.
seems like ether you have anydesk or teamviewer installed on your mobile phone.
